query:
ALTER TABLE subscriptions 
MODIFY COLUMN tier ENUM('free', 'trial', 'pro') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS plan ENUM('none', 'monthly', 'quarterly', 'biannual', 'annual') DEFAULT 'none',
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('active', 'trial', 'cancelled', 'expired') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trialStartedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasUsedTrial INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user cPRUkYw17AYhxV9.9bac57ba8fbc --database KLAyoHM6A4xBmdvHf6EzLV --execute ALTER TABLE subscriptions 
MODIFY COLUMN tier ENUM('free', 'trial', 'pro') DEFAULT 'free' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS plan ENUM('none', 'monthly', 'quarterly', 'biannual', 'annual') DEFAULT 'none',
MODIFY COLUMN status ENUM('active', 'trial', 'cancelled', 'expired') DEFAULT 'active' NOT NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trialStartedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS trialEndsAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasUsedTrial INT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL;
